comment: A single axiom for propositional calculus discovered by C. A. Meredith. This axiom has 19 symbols, sans auxiliaries. See notes in ~ merco1 . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 7-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
